description: This file defines a CalculatorTools class that extends a Toolkit class, providing various mathematical operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, exponentiation, factorial, prime check, and square root. The class allows enabling or disabling specific tools and logs operations.

classes.name: CalculatorTools
classes.description: A toolkit class providing various mathematical calculation methods, configurable via constructor parameters.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds two numbers and returns the result as a JSON string.

methods.name: subtract
methods.description: Subtracts the second number from the first and returns the result as a JSON string.

methods.name: multiply
methods.description: Multiplies two numbers and returns the result as a JSON string.

methods.name: divide
methods.description: Divides the first number by the second, handling division by zero, and returns the result as a JSON string.

methods.name: exponentiate
methods.description: Raises a number to a power and returns the result as a JSON string.

methods.name: factorial
methods.description: Calculates the factorial of a number and returns the result as a JSON string.

methods.name: is_prime
methods.description: Checks if a number is prime and returns the result as a JSON string.

methods.name: square_root
methods.description: Calculates the square root of a number, handling negative input, and returns the result as a JSON string.
